subtitle: This French dessert is perfect for the strawberry season.

method.text: Gently heat the milk, cream and vanilla essence in a pan until hand hot - DO NOT BOIL.
Mix the eggs, egg yolks, sugar, strawberries and remaining milk in a bowl. Add the warm cream mixture to it, stirring thoroughly. Pass the mixture through a fine strainer.
Pour the custard into small individual dishes or ramekins. Put these into a deep tray, half-filled with boiling water. Place in the oven for 35-40 min or until set.
Remove from oven. Dust with icing sugar. Glaze under the hot grill until crisp and golden brown. Serve immediately.

title: Strawberry creme brulee
